name: Mark Padilla
bio: An alumnus of Computer Science from the University of Toronto. Makes user-focused software for mobile and web. Currently in love with Flutter. A bookworm and write-aholic with an ear for soundtracks and Celtic music.

name: Aradhya Kunwar
bio: A UofT Computer Science alumnus. Has a niche for building web APIs and backend systems for user-centric software. Currently exploring the vastness of Node.js. Enjoys playing soccer both on the console and the turf.
